review: I love these dividers! The tab labels are easy to swap in and out, and the dividers are transparent, so you can see what's at the front of each section in your binder. (I'm an organizational nut, so I usually have a table of contents at the front of each tabbed section with a list of everything under each tab.) The entire divider is plastic, so the never tear or fray-- I've gotten tons of use out of each set I've purchased. Oh -- and the price is great!! I couldn't even find a better price at Walmart (yet another reason to avoid having to go there!) :) I highly recommend these dividers!!!
productTitle: Avery  Big Tab Insertable Plastic Dividers,  8-Tabs, 1 Set (11901)
